channel.title: BlackScape// All new bosses, Nex, Fast leveling///
channel.description:
[size=24pt][u][b]Hello[/b][/u][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/2v/111/4TeSGsLU/black.png[/img]
[u][b]Website:[/b][/u] http://blackscape718.webs.com/
On our scape we have alot of new stuffs on runescape. More players more fun!! Daily updates.
[size=14pt][b]New Bandos[/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/R/9E/3u0vq4ix/1/new-bandos.png[/img] [size=14pt][b]New Sara[/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/34/MI/2XMUgr1f/1/sara.png[/img] [size=14pt][b]New Armadyl[/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/9/11F/2E8QxQqa/1/new-arma.png[/img] [size=14pt][b]New Zammorak[/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/39/Yd/4Cw4vAgw/1/zamorak.png[/img] [b][size=14pt]Corporal beast[/size][/b] [img]http://shrani.si/f/3/9R/eFyb5Ur/corp.png[/img] [size=14pt][b][u]New Jad (fully---> all 63 waves full work)[/u][/b][/size] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/d/d2/20120409131316!Fighting_Jad.png[/img] [size=14pt][b][u]New fight kiln (fully ---> all 32 waves full work)[/u][/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/2W/Xr/4c9Duej4/kiln.png[/img]
~100% slayer ~22 trainable skills and other 2 skills from sof with lamps (still working on adding skills but i need donations)
[u]Dungeoneering:[/u] ~For free players & ~For donators :$
[u][i]With ecto tokens you get chaotics (ecto from dungeon)[/i][/u]
[img]http://shrani.si/f/3N/Wk/4sryRYpf/dung.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]~Glacors[/b][/size] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110919123102/runescape/images/thumb/f/fc/Glacor.png/250px-Glacor.png[/img] [size=12pt][b]~Qbd[/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/2R/uC/1zLbyFLu/1/qbd.png[/img] [size=12pt][b]~New kbd[/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/h/lw/2LmNXT3D/kbd.png[/img] [size=12pt][b]~Frosts dragons[/b][/size] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111110051041/runescape/images/thumb/5/56/Frost_dragon.png/250px-Frost_dragon.png[/img] [size=12pt][b]~Polypore dungeon[/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/j/JX/4tSvQZLr/poly.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]~Donator zone[/size][/b] [img]http://shrani.si/f/1G/Lc/2bb5nKdz/dz.png[/img] [size=12pt][b]~New nex[/b][/size] [img]http://shrani.si/f/1X/V4/1U3D8olc/1/nexx.png[/img]
In the future, we will add a few bosses that will dropped a lot of valuable items and also those which are in other servers to buy.
[size=18pt][u][b]Come and join us![/b][/u][/size]
Download client here: http://blackscape718.webs.com/
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ We add some new bosses.
~Kenedal (He drop fighter hat, fighter torso and korasi sword) [img]http://shrani.si/f/r/kV/4aw4PKXt/kenedal.png[/img]
~Bork (He drop dragon amour (sp)) [img]http://shrani.si/f/m/UP/4Ct0ulFN/brok.png[/img]
~Warped Gulega and Rammernaut (They drops primal items, but not primal weapons -- coming soon!) [img]http://shrani.si/f/2d/13h/4wDEfB3d/warped.png[/img]
~Dagannoth Kings (They drops rings and fury) [img]http://shrani.si/f/1K/we/3Nizfnpu/dagg.png[/img]

item.title: BlackScape// All new bosses, Nex, Fast leveling///
item.dc:creator: @kreten kreten
item.description:
@kreten wrote:

[size=24pt]Hello[/size]

Website:
http://blackscape718.webs.com/

On our scape we have alot of new stuffs on runescape. More players more fun!! Daily updates.

[size=14pt]New Bandos[/size]

[size=14pt]New Sara[/size]

[size=14pt]New Armadyl[/size]

[size=14pt]New Zammorak[/size]

[size=14pt]Corporal beast[/size]

[size=14pt]New Jad (fully—> all 63 waves full work)[/size]

[size=14pt]New fight kiln (fully —> all 32 waves full work)[/size]

~100% slayer
~22 trainable skills and other 2 skills from sof with lamps (still working on adding skills but i need donations)

Dungeoneering:
~For free players
&
~For donators

With ecto tokens you get chaotics (ecto from dungeon)

[size=12pt]~Glacors[/size]

[size=12pt]~Qbd[/size]

[size=12pt]~New kbd[/size]

[size=12pt]~Frosts dragons[/size]

[size=12pt]~Polypore dungeon[/size]

[size=12pt]~Donator zone[/size]

[size=12pt]~New nex[/size]

In the future, we will add a few bosses that will dropped a lot of valuable items and also those which are in other servers to buy.

[size=18pt]Come and join us![/size]

Download client here:
http://blackscape718.webs.com/

We add some new bosses.

~Kenedal
(He drop fighter hat, fighter torso and korasi sword)
[img]http://shrani.si/f/r/kV/4aw4PKXt/kenedal.png[/img]

~Bork
(He drop dragon amour (sp))
[img]http://shrani.si/f/m/UP/4Ct0ulFN/brok.png[/img]

~Warped Gulega  and  Rammernaut
(They drops primal items, but not primal weapons -- coming soon!)
[img]http://shrani.si/f/2d/13h/4wDEfB3d/warped.png[/img]

~Dagannoth Kings
(They drops rings and fury)
